title: Missing Docstrings in Parsing Logic
recommendation: Add a comprehensive docstring to the parse_candidate function to document expected input formats and potential parsing exceptions, improving long-term maintainability.

title: Parse candidate fallback logic is duplicated and hard to evolve
recommendation: Extract fallback resolution into a single helper (e.g., resolveCandidateWithFallback) and call it once to reduce duplication and future drift during parser updates.

title: Benchmark smoke test lacks parse-candidate validation coverage

evidence.snippet: No tools available for parse-candidate smoke benchmark validation

recommendation: Add smoke benchmark test case for parse-candidate function with representative CLI output samples
